_header: Jesu Christ of Nazareth / That died on cross with wounds wide
Subjects: Christ, prayers to; prayers, to Christ
_description: A popular prayer to Jesus — one quatrain

CULLl414.Transcription:
Ihesu crist of nazereyÞat deiid on cros with woundis
                    wydeWith þi passion and þi deeþbe myn defens on euery
                    syde
